solution_line_template: First find the number of nuts the two busy squirrels gather per day: {num_busy_squirrels} squirrels * {busy_squirrel_rate} nuts/day/squirrel = <<{num_busy_squirrels}*{busy_squirrel_rate}={busy_total_per_day}>>{busy_total_per_day} nuts/day

Then add the number the sleepy squirrel gathers each day: {busy_total_per_day} nuts/day + {sleepy_squirrel_rate} nuts/day = <<{busy_total_per_day}+{sleepy_squirrel_rate}={total_nuts_per_day}>>{total_nuts_per_day} nuts/day

Then multiply the number of nuts gathered daily by the number of days to find the total number of nuts gathered: {total_nuts_per_day} nuts/day * {num_days} days = <<{total_nuts_per_day}*{num_days}={total_nuts}>>{total_nuts} nuts
